entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -37.7°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -41.5°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few clouds. High minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 40. Wind chill minus 58 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
